Streaming Quicktime Source Released

08 Jul 1999

The folks over at Apple have released the source code for their Quicktime Streaming server. You guessed it, the server allows you to stream Quicktime data to clients on the web. The source code is available for Mac OSX, but should compile on most any *nix based system with a couple modifications.
